resources.string:
Turn your Xperia™ into a jukebox. Broadcast your party with real-time photo streaming.
This is the perfect app to have when you throw a party or go for a drive with friends.
With PartyShare, you can create a shared playlist with your friends and stream songs from your Xperia™ to a speaker. You can also upload photos effortlessly in real time.
Install PartyShare now and warm up your party!
Google Play Store is not installed or is disabled.
This party has already reached its max. number of participants.
Download stopped due to lack of memory. To resume download, try deleting some files.

1. Tap "Host a party" on your Xperia™.

2. Enter the party details and tap "OK".


Please note that only Xperia™ devices can host a party.

1) Make sure that PartyShare is installed and NFC is enabled on each device.

2) Hold two devices back to back so the NFC detection areas touch each other. When connected, the message "Touch to beam" appears.

3) Tap anywhere on your screen.


If PartyShare is not installed, the installation screen will automatically appear when you touch your Xperia™ to an NFC-enabled device.


You can also send the link to the screen by tapping the "Share app" button on this screen.
To share songs, tap Add songs. All songs in the shared playlist will play through the host\'s device. By connecting the device to a speaker, you can enjoy music at a high volume.

・Unless invited via NFC, everyone needs your consent to join the party.


・Using NFC, any partygoer can let other people join the party without your consent.


・All songs in the playlist will play through your Xperia™.


・Photos that you upload in this app will be shared with everyone at the party.


・The SSID and passphrase of the network are shared among connected devices.
Cannot join this party without the host\'s consent via NFC. You either need to be invited by the host or to select this party in a list where parties are present.
